Articles.Content:
There are many Saturn V type crafts on here and I really wanted to make one. Here is the result which I am some what proud of. It can get into a 100 by 100 orbit with spare fuel and a muner trajectory with spare fuel, quite a bit acualy. To combat this I flew in the most wastefull way I could. I did have a problem with the munar modual on docking, but I am not the best pilot. Also you might want to replace the sphere tanks on the munar modual with cylinders for more wiggle room, but I like a easier challenge. Any questions or comments please tell me so I can improve a bit. Have fun flying and here is an album (anyone who spots something wrong with the last two pics gets like a bagillion cookies ).

Javascript is disabled. View full album

5 of the new engines

Stage 4

CM SM & MM

Action Groups

1 toggles lander thrusters (for leaving the mun)

9 Parachutes

0 Get rid of escape tower

Abort Gets the heck out of there

Edited April 3, 2014 by Jeb Cubed

Nice looking rocket, the Apollo style mission plan is very well executed.

I'm desperately trying to find whats wrong with the last two pics so I can get a bagillion cookies.

Theres 2 mono tanks but one on the rest?

EDIT: no that was just my eyes deciving me.

EDIT 2: The tanks aren't sticking out as much?

Theres 2 mono tanks but one on the rest?
